content: When you give the Boar the Jade Lotus, he’ll relay some interesting information about a “Realm of Gold” that he’s seeking, and will leave the temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fuban.md', within the main section titled 'Fuban', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
When you give the Boar the Jade Lotus, he’ll relay some interesting information about a “Realm of Gold” that he’s seeking, and will leave the temple.
